title: Game Unplayable - Mac
body:
So I logged in this afternoon to play (played earlier today and no problems)....

- Constant "trying to reconnect" at main screen
- Unable to see loot (won't load, gives error)

I try to join a game, disconnected at champ select, dodge timer.

Ran full repair.

Login and seems ok, join game, on load screen keeps giving "cancel / retry" to connect.

After several tries I get into game.

Now when I click, there is a MASSIVE delay on response time and when I engage in combat with drag or champs, my abilities don't respond at all.

WTF IS GOING ON?!!

I just cost a team a loss and worried I'm gonna get reported / punished for it.

replies.body: Sometimes certain firewall or antivirus settings can block your network from reaching our servers when going into the loading screen, causing this "trying to reconnect" loop. Do me a favor and either [**disable or add exceptions for League to your firewalls**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq3) but also be sure to [**reconfigure your DNS settings as well**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq4). Be sure to let me know how these steps work out for you!

and for some reason my emotes keep blinking like I have a new one.

I click on emote page and it says error code EM01
